channel.title: Help with clients
channel.description:
I'm totally new to clients. i googled for help but no luck really with this. So i figured I'd ask.
I want to download some clients and when I hit run, you know, the .bat file. it says error, somethine in folder is missing. Any up to date clients that are not like that?
Also are there any clients like mopar scape 3.2 thar are up to date an let you do the ::pickup command?
Thanks

item.title: Help with clients
item.dc:creator: @dgratson dgratson
item.description:
@dgratson wrote:

Alright, thanks. Just want tot konw, are there any clients up to date that are like moparscape where you have the commands such as ::pickup? then the item number? THe 3.2 moparscape has glitches (wich I don’t mind) but is not up to date

Read full topic

item.title: Help with clients
item.dc:creator: @the1337legend the1337legend
item.description:
@the1337legend wrote:

There are many clients that work, it just depends what you want.
If you want a old school style server, i suggest you search this site for a “317” server called
“iclarity” it is very well done, and has old style graphics and old school pking.

If you want something that is similar to runescape, you would want a “508, 525, 554” server, either one of those 3 are basically up to date with most of runescape, just they are sorted differently which makes things harder to find and work with until your use to it. A decent server for this depends on what your looking for, many 525+ servers, which contain d claws, pvp armour etc, that look 100% like runescape are PVP only, because people have not developed and released NPC combat for these server’s yet. A decent 525 server, would be pur3z525, simply search for it. although it has a anti-flooder, so you may need to find the tutorial on how to remove it.

Read full topic
